content: Combat sport events in 2022 ***ONE: Bad Blood*** was a [Combat sport](/wiki/Combat_sport) event produced by [ONE Championship](/wiki/ONE_Championship) that took place on February 11, 2022, at the [Singapore Indoor Stadium](/wiki/Singapore_Indoor_Stadium) in [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), Singapore. ## Background [Bibiano Fernandes](/wiki/Bibiano_Fernandes) was scheduled to make his second ONE bantamweight title defense against [John Lineker](/wiki/John_Lineker) in the main event. However, Lineker tested positive for COVID days before the event and the bout was pulled and However, the bout was moved to ONE: Lights Out. An interim [ONE Heavyweight World Championship](/wiki/ONE_Heavyweight_World_Championship) bout between [Anatoly Malykhin](/wiki/Anatoly_Malykhin) and Kiril Grishenko was scheduled for ONE: Only the Brave, but the bout was moved to this event and was promoted to the main event. Former ONE Flyweight Muay Thai Champion [Jonathan Haggerty](/wiki/Jonathan_Haggerty) will make his return to action when he faces #4-ranking Flyweight Muay Thai [Mongkolpetch Petchyindee Academy](/wiki/Mongkolpetch_Petchyindee_Academy). A strawweight bout between former [ONE Strawweight Champion](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_champions#Strawweight_World_Championship) [Yosuke Saruta](/wiki/Yosuke_Saruta) and [Gustavo Balart](/wiki/Gustavo_Balart) was planned for the event. However, Saruta tested positive for COVID days before the event and the bout will be rescheduled. A welterweight bout between former title challenger Ken Hasegawa and Murad Ramazanov was scheduled for the event. However, Hasegawa was injured and out of his clash with Murad Ramazanov, the bout is set to be rebooked. The Filipina fighter Jenelyn Olsim was set to faces Jihin Radzuan of Malaysia in a women's atomweight bout. However, a two days before the event, Olsim withdrew from the bout, reportedly because she has suffered an injury during her training. She was replaced by [Mei Yamaguchi](/wiki/Mei_Yamaguchi). ## Results Main Card (YouTube / ONE Super App)Weight classMethodRoundTimeNotesHeavyweight[Anatoly Malykhin](/wiki/Anatoly_Malykhin)def.Kirill GrishenkoKO (punch)23:42[a]Flyweight Muay Thai[Jonathan Haggerty](/wiki/Jonathan_Haggerty)def.[Mongkolpetch Petchyindee](/wiki/Mongkolpetch_Petchyindee_Academy)Decision (unanimous)33:00BantamweightChen Ruidef.Mark AbelardoDecision (unanimous)35:00Catchweight (118 lbs)Jihin Radzuandef.[Mei Yamaguchi](/wiki/Mei_Yamaguchi)Decision (unanimous)35:00FlyweightWoo Sung Hoondef.Yodkaikaew FairtexTKO (punches)10:18Strawweight[Danial Williams](/wiki/Danial_Williams)def.[Dejdamrong Sor Amnuaysirichoke](/wiki/Dejdamrong_Sor_Amnuaysirichoke)KO (punch to the body)21:35Lead Card (YouTube / Facebook / ONE Super App)HeavyweightDustin Joynsondef.Hugo CunhaDecision (split)35:00Women's AtomweightLin Heqindef.Bi NguyenDecision (unanimous)35:00HeavyweightOdie Delaneydef.Thomas NarmoSubmission (hammerlock)11:06BantamweightSunoto Peringkatvs.Tial ThangNo Contest (accidental knee to groin)11:37[b] ## Bonus awards The following fighters were awarded bonuses: - **$100,000 Performance of the Night: Anatoly Malykhin** - **$50,000 Performance of the Night: Jonathan Haggerty** and **Woo Sung Hoon** - Martial Arts portal - [2022 in ONE Championship](/wiki/2022_in_ONE_Championship) - [List of ONE Championship events](/wiki/List_of_ONE_Championship_events) - [List of current ONE fighters](/wiki/List_of_current_ONE_fighters)
title: ONE: Bad Blood
